story:
You are in a dark cave.

What do you do?

next.story:
You wander around for hours, but cannot find your way.

What do you do?

...

You fall asleep and die of cold.

 Game Over!

After walking for a few more hours, your feet begin to hurt.

 What do you do?

You keep on walking, but cut your foot. You eventually bleed out and die.

 Game Over!

Walking upside down on your hands causes you to accidentally changes directions.

It turns out that you are now walking in the correct direction. You eventually find the light and the end of the cave.

 What do you do?

You make it out alive.

 Success!

You run into a wall.

That hurt!

What do you do?

You brush yourself off and keep on running.

Eventually you see a light at the end of the tunnel. You reach it and escape.

Success!

You slip into a deep depression and die.

Game Over!

You hit your head and die.

Game Over!
